post.body: LMAO. I hate life. My mom is making me go out soon. But, we're going to the library and Barnes + Noble so, it's not as bad.
Is it sad that I lol'd at that?
I'M GOING TO BED NOW. RAWR. lol xD ILY.
I'm going to sleepeh now. :p He can whatever he wants to me. ;)
HE'S SO DAMN SEXY. AND HOT. I LOVE HIM. *huggles her invisble andy doll*
RAWR. I HATE YOU NOW............Now, I don't hate you.
xD Dude. I love Anderson Cooper a little too much. I can't stop watching videos of him on youtube.
Same here. lol I just know a lot of adorable bald men. xD
I'm so tired. I just spent the whole day cleaning. *thud*
Lol. I think that a lot of bald guys are adorable. xD
HE'S ADORABLE. :D
*waves* HI CELLI. :]
LMAO. YOU MEAN THIS DUDE - http://tinyurl.com/5hbh9k
Because, I have to get up and do work all day. Dx
THE MORNING IS NOT GOOD. IT'S HORRIBLE. >.<
lol, yeah. Nurse!Joker is the sexiest kind. ;)
I'm a loser. If you mention a coin, I think of Harvey Dent. Mention a nurse, I think of The Joker.
THEY PROBABLY FLIP A COIN TO FIGURE IT OUT. IT'S LIKE THEY'RE BOTH HARVEY DENT. "Heads, you top. Tails, you bottom." xD
YEAH! I seriously think now that Jon would HAVE to be top because he's shorter than Stephen. xD
YOU ARE CRAZY. lol xD My mind is so dirty, when you said small boxes on top of the big ones I thought of Jon and Stephen.
*huggles back*
*hides* I'M SORRY. but, hey, you don't love Batman so, it's fair. I don't love something you do and vice versa.
Ohhh, that might explain why I don't know it. I'm that fond of Reese Witherspoon. :p
I have no clue what Election is. :p *feels stupid*
You are AH-mazing. :3
How could I not? ^.^
I do the head banging all the time when I listen to Queen. :3
LMAO. LMAO. LMAO. SO....FUNNY. xDDD
Oh well, at least I gots some pizza to eat. :3
MY STUPID TV IS MESSED UP. Dx
DAMN IT. I'M MISSING JEOPARDY. *runs to see really cute guy*
lol xD It finally started snowing around 11. :p There's quite a bit of snow...Now, I have to shovel tomorrow. Dx
I'm new. :3
Frozen Bubbles is addictive and fun to play. :) - http://tinyurl.com/2pxlce
WE GOT A FUCKING SNOW DAY!!!!!!!!!! XDDDDDD AND IT STILL HASN'T SNOWED YET. HOW AWESOME IS THAT?
Yesh, they do. big time. But, now it's time for bed. We'll see what tomorrow brings. (Is hoping for no school. >.>)
We probably won't get a day off though because my school superintendent is stupid and an asshole.
We might get snow here tomorrow. Dx
RAWR. I'mma eat some more strufala then go to bed. :3 GOOD NIGHT.
I NEED COOKIES. Dx My arm itches. :p And I'm writing a little ficlet. ^.^
